title: Still looking for lower grade Red Portrait Cobb
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Still looking for lower grade Red Portrait Cobb
posts.post_content:
Am still looking for lower grade/high eye appeal Red Portrait Cobb (yeah, who isn’t, right??!!)

I was not able to win this past weekend’s LOTG auction for a sweet 1.5 (looked undergraded… and I guess other bidders agreed 😢)

I have had several options sent to me (thx!) but this is a once/lifetime purchase for my PC so I want to be so sure this is “the one”. 

Would love to hear from you with any ideas - am also going to this weekend’s big Wilmington Mass show so I expect to see some options there too. 

Thx again for any leads!

Jeff
